verses.verse: Am <S%G1510><s%> I not an apostle? <S%G652><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> I not free? <S%G1658><s%> have I not seen <S%G3708><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord? <S%G2962><s%> are not you my work <S%G2041><s%> in the Lord? <S%G2962><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> I be not an apostle <S%G652><s%> to others, <S%G243><s%> yet <S%G235><s%> doubtless <S%G1065><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> to you: for the seal <S%G4973><s%> of my <S%G1699><s%> apostleship <S%G651><s%> are you in the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
My <S%G1699><s%> answer <S%G627><s%> to them that do examine <S%G350><s%> me is this, <S%G3778><s%>
Have <S%G2192><s%> we not power <S%G1849><s%> to eat <S%G5315><s%> and to drink? <S%G4095><s%>

Have <S%G2192><s%> we not power <S%G1849><s%> to lead <S%G4013><s%> about <S%G4013><s%> a sister, <S%G79><s%> a wife, <S%G1135><s%> as well <S%G2532><s%> as other <S%G3062><s%> apostles, <S%G652><s%> and as the brothers <S%G80><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and Cephas? <S%G2786><s%>
Or <S%G2228><s%> I only <S%G3441><s%> and Barnabas, <S%G921><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> not we power <S%G1849><s%> to forbear <S%G3361><s%> working? <S%G2038><s%>

Who <S%G5100><s%> goes a warfare <S%G4754><s%> any <S%G4218><s%> time <S%G4218><s%> at <S%G4218><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> charges? <S%G3800><s%> who <S%G5100><s%> plants <S%G5452><s%> a vineyard, <S%G290><s%> and eats <S%G2068><s%> not of the fruit <S%G2590><s%> thereof? <S%G846><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> who <S%G5100><s%> feeds <S%G4165><s%> a flock, <S%G4167><s%> and eats <S%G2068><s%> not of the milk <S%G1051><s%> of the flock? <S%G4167><s%>
Say <S%G2980><s%> I these <S%G5023><s%> things as a man? <S%G444><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> not the law <S%G3551><s%> the same <S%G5023><s%> also? <S%G2532><s%>

For it is written <S%G1125><s%> in the law <S%G3551><s%> of Moses, <S%G3475><s%> You shall not muzzle <S%G5392><s%> the mouth of the ox <S%G1016><s%> that treads <S%G248><s%> out the corn. Does God <S%G2316><s%> take care <S%G3199><s%> for oxen? <S%G1016><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he it altogether <S%G3843><s%> for our sakes? For our sakes, no <S%G1063><s%> doubt, <S%G1063><s%> this is written: <S%G1125><s%> that he that plows <S%G722><s%> should <S%G3784><s%> plow <S%G722><s%> in hope; <S%G1680><s%> and that he that threshes <S%G248><s%> in hope <S%G1680><s%> should be partaker <S%G3348><s%> of his hope. <S%G1680><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> sown <S%G4687><s%> to you spiritual <S%G4152><s%> things, is it a great <S%G3173><s%> thing if <S%G1487><s%> we shall reap <S%G2325><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> carnal <S%G4559><s%> things?

If <S%G1487><s%> others <S%G243><s%> be partakers <S%G3348><s%> of this <S%G3588><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over you, are not we rather? <S%G3123><s%> Nevertheless <S%G235><s%> we have <S%G2192><s%> not used <S%G5530><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> power; <S%G1849><s%> but suffer <S%G4722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things, lest <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> we should hinder <S%G5100><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Do you not know <S%G1492><s%> that they which minister <S%G2038><s%> about holy <S%G2413><s%> things live <S%G2068><s%> of the things of the temple? <S%G2411><s%> and they which wait <S%G4332><s%> at the altar <S%G2379><s%> are partakers <S%G4829><s%> with the altar? <S%G2379><s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> has the Lord <S%G2962><s%> ordained <S%G1299><s%> that they which preach <S%G2605><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> should live <S%G2198><s%> of the gospel. <S%G2098><s%>

But I have used <S%G5530><s%> none <S%G3762><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> things: neither have I written <S%G1125><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things, that it should be so <S%G3779><s%> done <S%G1096><s%> to me: for it were better <S%G2570><s%> <S%G3123><s%> for me to die, <S%G599><s%> than <S%G2228><s%> that any <S%G5100><s%> man should make <S%G2758><s%> my glorying <S%G2745><s%> void. <S%G2758><s%>

For though <S%G1437><s%> I preach <S%G2097><s%> the gospel, <S%G2097><s%> I have <S%G2076><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> to glory <S%G2745><s%> of: for necessity <S%G318><s%> is laid <S%G1945><s%> on me; yes, <S%G1161><s%> woe <S%G3759><s%> is to me, if <S%G1437><s%> I preach <S%G2097><s%> not the gospel! <S%G2097><s%>

For if <S%G1487><s%> I do <S%G4238><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> thing willingly, <S%G1635><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> a reward: <S%G3408><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> against <S%G210><s%> my will, <S%G210><s%> a dispensation <S%G3622><s%> of the gospel is committed <S%G4100><s%> to me.

What <S%G5101><s%> is my reward <S%G3408><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> Truly that, when I preach <S%G2097><s%> the gospel, <S%G2097><s%> I may make <S%G5087><s%> the gospel <S%G2098><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> without <S%G77><s%> charge, <S%G77><s%> that I abuse <S%G2710><s%> not my power <S%G1849><s%> in the gospel. <S%G2098><s%>

For though I be free <S%G1658><s%> from all <S%G3956><s%> men, yet have <S%G2192><s%> I made <S%G1402><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> servant <S%G1402><s%> to all, <S%G3956><s%> that I might gain <S%G2770><s%> the more. <S%G4119><s%>

And to the Jews <S%G2453><s%> I became <S%G1096><s%> as a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> that I might gain <S%G2770><s%> the Jews; <S%G2453><s%> to them that are under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> as under <S%G5259><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> that I might gain <S%G2770><s%> them that are under <S%G5259><s%> the law; <S%G3551><s%>

To them that are without <S%G459><s%> law, <S%G459><s%> as without <S%G459><s%> law, <S%G459><s%> (being <S%G5607><s%> not without <S%G459><s%> law <S%G459><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> but under <S%G1772><s%> the law <S%G1772><s%> to Christ, <S%G5547><s%>) that I might gain <S%G2770><s%> them that are without <S%G459><s%> law. <S%G459><s%>

To the weak <S%G770><s%> became <S%G1096><s%> I as weak, <S%G770><s%> that I might gain <S%G2770><s%> the weak: <S%G770><s%> I am made <S%G1096><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things to all <S%G3956><s%> men, that I might by all <S%G3956><s%> means <S%G3843><s%> save <S%G4982><s%> some. <S%G5100><s%>
And this <S%G5124><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> for the gospel's <S%G2098><s%> sake, that I might be partaker <S%G4791><s%> thereof <S%G846><s%> with you.

Know <S%G1492><s%> you not that they which run <S%G5143><s%> in a race <S%G4712><s%> run <S%G5143><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> but one <S%G1520><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> the prize? <S%G1017><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> run, <S%G5143><s%> that you may obtain. <S%G2638><s%>

And every <S%G3956><s%> man that strives <S%G75><s%> for the mastery is temperate <S%G1467><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things. Now <S%G3303><s%> they do it to obtain <S%G2983><s%> a corruptible <S%G5349><s%> crown; <S%G4735><s%> but we an incorruptible. <S%G862><s%>
I therefore <S%G5106><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> run, <S%G5143><s%> not as uncertainly; <S%G84><s%> so <S%G3779><s%> fight <S%G4438><s%> I, not as one that beats <S%G1194><s%> the air: <S%G109><s%>

But I keep <S%G5299><s%> under <S%G5299><s%> my body, <S%G4983><s%> and bring <S%G1396><s%> it into subjection: <S%G1396><s%> lest <S%G3381><s%> that by any <S%G3381><s%> means, <S%G4458><s%> when I have preached <S%G2784><s%> to others, <S%G243><s%> I myself should be a castaway. <S%G96><s%>
